TopicTitle: How to add USI functions/switch to B9 HX parts?

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody,

I was wondering if anyone has made an MM patch to incorporate USI's switcher (supplies, materialkits, etc) to B9's HX parts? I tried it awhile ago with my "limited" MM knowledge wasn't able to =">

 

Regards and thanks in advance! =)

12 hours ago, ErevanGaming said:

Hi everybody,

I was wondering if anyone has made an MM patch to incorporate USI's switcher (supplies, materialkits, etc) to B9's HX parts? I tried it awhile ago with my "limited" MM knowledge wasn't able to =">

 

Regards and thanks in advance! =)

Hi, 

The most conivenient way to do it is to copy/paste all the relevant modules from an USI part. You can then tweak the values if you want to. But some USI parts have reconfigurable bays, in this case you must copy/paste the "bay" module and ALL the different bay config modules. I don't remember the exact names but that's how I did it in my latest install. There might also be some additional usi life support modules apart from the converters/switches/configs/bays etc.
